page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: There is only one farm which is situated on the MYNYDD MARGAM moutain.Its main activity being the breeding of sheep for both meat and wool. In the past one of the main industries was that of farming, it still is in some sections of the borough but not in Margam or Taibach. Here the onslaught of the steel making industry has steadily encrouched upon the farm land until all that is left is very hill terrain, unsuitable for many forms of farming. Perhaps a typical case of how society changed with the industrial revolution.
